Articles.Content:
Hi 

After every time i recover a craft i can't access any building and half of the HUD disappears

I found out that if i exit the game ( not just the save ) and come back it will fix itself but is the a way to fix it on and for all?

I found older posts ( 2015, 2016 ) with the same problem but without the answer

would appreciate any help 

thanks, TheCH

Welcome to the forum

Sounds like an active input lock. When this happens again, open the debug menu (alt + F12 or ctrl + alt + F12), look for the 'Input Locks' entry and click 'Clear Input Locks'. If it helps, this is just a work around which is quicker than leaving the game but I don't know how this can happen in a stock game (well, except for #19375 in 1.4.4. but it is a different situation).

If your game is pure stock, you should consider to reinstall your game (create a backup of your savegame!), maybe some gamefiles are currupted. But if you use any mods, even though you posted in the unmodded subforum, you should post a log file and read through this post
